root.text_male: Should I trust Alex and go to the bathroom to talk to him?
root.text_female: Should I trust Alex and go to the bathroom to talk to Ana?

root.text: ¿Si voy me dejarán en paz de una vez por todas?.
I have nothing to do in class.
Really? You were leaving without stopping by the bathroom.
Think it as an opportunity to fix everything, c'mon... I'll walk with you.
